title: New honour option.
body:
For the allied team there is:
Friendly 
Helpful
Teamwork

but of the enemy team there is only:
Honourable opponent.

and so many times there has been a player on the enemy team that has play very well, like such good teamwork and amazing mechanics, but they would make, not nasty or toxic but certainly not 'honourable' remarks or actions, and so i feel i don't want to 'honour' them, but i do want to acknowledge their behaviour. So i think there should be a 'well played' or something that gives us another option to give them credit for their accomplishments.
